name: Dragon Tale
description: Dragon Tale is an adventure game based on the fable of The Lion and the Mouse, following a typical three act arc. The story begins when the player wakes up on a seemingly ordinary day, only to be attacked by a dragon. The player travels to the village and completes quests which reward them with items and upgrades. Finally, the player enters the dragon’s lair where they fight the dragon. The game provides two endings which are determined by the kindness of the player.
